name: syncShopifyToBigcommerce
description: Transfers product details from Shopify to BigCommerce and sends Slack notification

rest.schema: {"openapi":"3.0.3","info":{"title":"Flow OpenAPI Specification","description":"OpenAPI specification for the flow","version":"1.0.11"},"servers":[{"url":"https://qa.fastn.ai/api/v1"}],"paths":{"/syncShopifyToBigcommerce":{"post":{"summary":"syncShopifyToBigcommerce","operationId":"POST-syncShopifyToBigcommerce","parameters":[{"in":"header","name":"x-fastn-space-id","description":"x-fastn-space-id Header","schema":{"type":"string","default":"60aecfe8-83ed-4df9-8467-8cf636d8eeff"},"required":false},{"in":"header","name":"stage","description":"stage Header","schema":{"type":"string","default":"DRAFT"},"required":false},{"in":"header","name":"content-type","description":"content-type Header","schema":{"type":"string","default":"application/json"},"required":false},{"in":"header","name":"x-fastn-space-tenantid","description":"x-fastn-space-tenantid Header","schema":{"type":"string","default":""},"required":false}],"requestBody":{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"input":{"type":"object","description":"Free form JSON","title":"JSON","properties":{"id":{"type":"string"}}}},"type":"object"}}}},"responses":{"200":{"description":"Success","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"JSON","properties":{},"type":"object","description":"Free form JSON"}}}}},"security":[{"apiKey":[]}]}}},"components":{"securitySchemes":{"apiKey":{"in":"header","name":"x-fastn-api-key","type":"apiKey"},"bearerAuth":{"type":"http","scheme":"bearer"}}}}

inline.uiCode: {"actionType":"map","target":{"auth":{"actionType":"map","target":{"apiKeyValue":{"actionType":"map","target":"{{data.secrets.shopify_access_token}}","targetType":"string","actions":[],"enum":[],"title":"API Key Value","description":"Your Shopify API key value.","isRequred":true,"default":"","autoEscape":"MANUAL"},"storeName":{"actionType":"map","target":"{{data.secrets.shopify_store_name}}","targetType":"string","actions":[],"enum":[],"title":"Store Name","description":"The name of your Shopify store.","isRequred":true,"default":"","autoEscape":"MANUAL"}},"targetType":"object","actions":[],"default":[]},"params":{"actionType":"map","target":{"limit":{"actionType":"map","target":"10","targetType":"string","actions":[],"enum":[],"title":"","description":"test the flow Description","isRequred":false,"default":"","autoEscape":"MANUAL"}},"targetType":"object","actions":[],"default":[]}},"targetType":"object"}

{"actionType":"map","target":{"auth":{"actionType":"map","target":{"apiKeyValue":{"actionType":"map","target":"{{data.secrets.bigcommerce_access_token}}","targetType":"string","actions":[],"enum":[],"title":"API Key Value","description":"The API key value for authentication.","isRequred":true,"default":"","autoEscape":"MANUAL"},"apiKeyName":{"actionType":"map","target":"X-Auth-Token","targetType":"string","actions":[],"enum":[],"title":"API Key Name","description":"The API key name for authentication.","isRequred":true,"default":"","autoEscape":"MANUAL"},"storeHash":{"actionType":"map","target":"{{data.secrets.bigcommerce_store_hash}}","targetType":"string","actions":[],"enum":[],"title":"Store Hash","description":"The store hash for authentication.","isRequred":true,"default":"","autoEscape":"MANUAL"}},"targetType":"object","actions":[],"default":[]},"body":{"actionType":"map","target":"{{data.steps.transformProductData.output.productData}}","targetType":"object","actions":[],"enum":[],"title":"Product Details","description":"Product details for the Bigcommerce API request.","isRequred":true,"default":"","autoEscape":"MANUAL"}},"targetType":"object"}

{"actionType":"map","target":{"auth":{"actionType":"map","target":{"bearerToken":{"actionType":"map","target":"{{data.secrets.slack_bearer_token}}","targetType":"string","actions":[],"enum":[],"title":"Bearer Token","description":"Bearer token for authentication with the Slack API.","isRequred":true,"default":"","autoEscape":"MANUAL"}},"targetType":"object","actions":[],"default":[]},"body":{"actionType":"map","target":{"channel":{"actionType":"map","target":"#ai_testing","targetType":"string","actions":[],"enum":[],"title":"Channel ID","description":"Slack channel ID to send the message to.","isRequred":true,"default":"","autoEscape":"MANUAL"},"text":{"actionType":"map","target":"{{data.steps.prepareSuccessMessage.output.message}}","targetType":"string","actions":[],"enum":[],"title":"Message Text","description":"Plain text message.","isRequred":true,"default":"","autoEscape":"MANUAL"}},"targetType":"object","actions":[],"default":[]}},"targetType":"object"}

inline.code:
{
  "status": "success",
  "message": "Product sync from Shopify to BigCommerce completed successfully",
  "productsProcessed": {{data.steps.prepareSuccessMessage.output.count}},
  "timestamp": "{{ 'now' | date('Y-m-d H:i:s') }}",
  "slackNotified": true,
  "channel": "#ai_testing"
}
